name: DeliLife
description:
Gameplay

How many days can you survive as a  deliveryman in gig economy? Earn money to avoid bankrupt. Also pay attention to your tiredness, overwork damages your health.

Control

“WASD” for move. Map can be toggled by “M” or click on the map icon.

Details

Turn on “Take order” to let new orders be generated

The player needs to pay 50 everyday at 00:00 AM. 

10 minutes in reality equal 24 hours in game. 

Being awake for 16 hours in game brings tiredness to 100%.

Every extra awake hour damages 5 health.

Click “Rest” to clear tiredness and recover health.
